==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|よ|だん|かつ|よう|yomi=y}}
A compound of {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|四段|tr=yodan||four grades}} and {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|活用|tr=katsuyō||conjugation}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|よだん かつよう|acc=4|acc_ref=DJR|y=y}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|よだん かつよう|hhira=よだんくわつよう}}
